I'll take your order in a few moments.\/faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/Hello, @! What a pleasant surprise!#$b#I was just stopping in to relax after an eight hour writing session.$h\/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/Bartender! Two of your finest ales, please!^Bartender! Fetch me your finest ale. And bring some wine for the lady!\/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/<dialogue who="Gus">...$u\/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/<dialogue who="Gus">There you go, sir.$u\/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/$q 28376 null#Wait. I propose a toast! To...#$r 28376 25 event_toast4#To Pelican Town!#$r 28376 50 event_toast2#To our friendship!#$r 28376 -10 event_toast1#To my good health!#$r 28376 -50 event_toast3#To your doom!\/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/*Hic*... Strong stuff...$h\/pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut" 96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: "jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/<dialogue who="Gus">Oh, Hello there, buddy.^Hi, @.\/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/<dialogue who="Gus">*sigh*...I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and It's not looking very good, @.$s#$b#The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks!$s#$b#...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings.$s\/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/<dialogue who="Gus">@, you gotta help me!$s\/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/Hiya!$h#$b#Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift.\/emote Gus 28/<dialogue who="Gus">Er... Well, okay Pam.$s\/emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/$q 207 null#@, what's going on here?#$r 207 -50 event_credit1#You need to pay your tab right now!#$r 208 15 event_credit2#The saloon isn't doing well, financially\/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/....$u#$b#*sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then.$s\/move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/<dialogue who="Gus">Thanks, Pam!$h\/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/<dialogue who="Gus">And thank you, @.$u\/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/<dialogue who="Gus">Now, let's get you that drink, Pam.$h\/friendship Gus 50/<dialogue who="Gus">Thanks for your help, @. This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon.\" 97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun: "none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/<dialogue who="Clint">Hello, @... care to join me?\/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/<dialogue who="Clint">Let me just go ahead and tell you what's on my mind.$u#$b#I have terrible luck with women, @...*sigh*$s#$b#I'm a nice guy if you get to know me, I swear!$u\/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/<dialogue who="Clint">The girls all seem to like you, @...^You're a girl, @...\/<dialogue who="Clint">$q 211 null#Got any tips?^What advice can you give me?#$r 211 25 event_advice1#Impress women with your strength and charm#$r 211 25 event_advice1#Act crazy, to keep people guessing#$r 211 0 event_advice2#Just act natural... be yourself#$r 211 25 event_advice1#Treat women the same as men\/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/<dialogue who="Emily">Hi Clint, what can I get for you tonight?$h\/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/<dialogue who="Clint">Yes!\/pause 300/<dialogue who="Clint">Er.. I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please.$s#$b#...$u\/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/<dialogue who="Emily">Hi @.\/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/<dialogue who="Clint">Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order.#$b#Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering...$h\/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/<dialogue who="Emily">Yes, Clint?$u\/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/<dialogue who="Clint">... nevermind.$s\/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/<dialogue who="Emily">Hi, Shane! Here's your beverage.$h\/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/<dialogue who="Shane">Thanks, Emily!$h#$b#So... How's your shift coming along?\/<dialogue who="Emily">It's fine! Thanks for asking, Shane!$h#$b#Do you have any new chicken stories for me?\/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/<dialogue who="Clint">*sigh*$s#$b#I'm doomed...$s\/end warpOut" 911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMessage: "gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/Thanks, Gus. That was great.\/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/This is nice... I've never dined in here before.\/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/Um, anyway... I reserved this private room so we could talk...$l\/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/<dialogue who="Emily">I've got a linguini with mushroom cream sauce for Mr. @.^I've got a kale and walnut salad for the lady.#$b#...and a grilled steak for Alex.^And a grilled steak for the gentleman.\/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/Thanks.\/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/So, what I wanted to say was...$9\/playMusic musicboxsong/*gulp*$s\/pause 600/Well... when we first met, I was instantly drawn to you. It was confusing... I'd never felt that way about anyone.$l^When I first met you, I thought you were really cute.$l#$b#I kept telling myself 'You can't have these kinds of feelings for another guy'.$l^Normally, when I have a crush on someone, the feeling goes away pretty quick...$l\/pause 800/...But my heart was telling me something else.^...But with you, it kept growing.$l\/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 \"#I feel the same way.#I'm sorry... I don't feel that way about you.\"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/...$l#$b#I can't believe it took this long to say that to each other.$l\/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/Mmm... this steak is outstanding. Can you smell that fragrant sauce?$10\/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/...$l\" rejectJosh: "pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/...Oh...$s#$b#I...I'm sorry if I made you uncomfortable...$s\/pause 2000/I'm not hungry anymore...$s\/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/...$l\" 195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/<dialogue who="Sam">Hey!\/What's up?\/<dialogue who="Shane">Oh, hey\/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">You showed up just in time for the first ever Pelican Town 8-ball tournament!\/pause 500/Don't worry, I've never played before, either.$h\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Shane">It's easy, you just gotta put some mustard on the cue ball...$h\/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message \"You played a round of pool with the boys.\"/pause 1000/message \"Sebastian won, of course... but it was still a lot of fun!\"/pause 500/end" 195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/<dialogue who="Sam">Not so fast!\/Hold it!\/<dialogue who="Shane">Stop!\/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/<dialogue who="Sam">Never thought you'd find all your 'boyfriends' in one room, huh @?$a\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">You tricked all of us into thinking we loved you...$s^@... I thought you wanted to get married and start a family with me... What did I do wrong?$s\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Shane">The last shred of hope I had left is completely destroyed... Thanks, @. Are you happy now?$s\/pause 500/@? I thought... I thought we were 'one of a kind'... But you were just using me?$s^What are you looking at *me* for? You think I'm gonna come to your rescue?$a\/pause 500/For once, I'm at a loss for words... $a\/pause 500/playMusic wedding/<dialogue who="Sam">Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer!$a^We all know the truth, now! And we're not going to tolerate this!$a\/That's right!\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Sebastian">Well? What do you have to say for yourself?$a\/pause 1000/question fork1 \"#I'm sorry... what I did was wrong.#Guys, calm down! I can explain...\"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/Sure...\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Shane">Nice try, but that's not going to cut it...$a\/pause 1000/playMusic none/<dialogue who="Sam">...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, fellas?$u\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">...yes.$s\/Absolutely.$a\/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Sam">We're all giving you the cold shoulder!$a\/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut" choseToExplain: "pause 100/<dialogue who="Shane">I doubt it...\/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 \"#You were all too pushy with me! You made it difficult to say 'no'!#Pierre pressured me! He wanted to sell more bouquets!#(Start crying)\"/pause 100/fork crying/<dialogue who="Sam">Liar!\/Yeah, right!\/Don't blame others for your mistakes! You're just losing more respect with us...$a\/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/<dialogue who="Sam">...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?$u\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">...yes.$s\/<dialogue who="Sebastian">Absolutely.$a\/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Sam">We're all giving you the cold shoulder!$a\/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut" crying: "pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/<dialogue who="Harvey">That's not going to work! You won't be preying on our sympathies this time!$a\/I'll assume this is just another act...$a^Typical...$a\/pause 100/<dialogue who="Sebastian">You need to take responsibility for what you've done...$a\/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/<dialogue who="Sam">...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?$u\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Harvey">...yes.$s\/<dialogue who="Sebastian">Absolutely.$a\/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Sam">We're all giving you the cold shoulder!$a\/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut" wewereworried: "emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/<dialogue who="Shane">I'm your husband... you should trust me. I've always been honest with you about my problems.$a#$b#Look... I know I haven't been able to quit cold turkey... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm getting a lot healthier.#$b#My life is better now than it's ever been. I'm not in such a dark place anymore...\/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/<dialogue who="Shane">You know, when I'm playing this game, I become so focused that I can't think about anything else. It really helps when I've got 'the urge'...\/faceDirection Shane 2/<dialogue who="Shane">Anyway... I'll just... eh... play ONE more round and head home. Okay?\/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Shane">You guys must have been really confused when you came in and saw me in front of the arcade machine!$h\" 3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: "distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/Big play!\/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/<dialogue who="George">Score!\/pause 400/There we go!\/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/<dialogue who="George">Atta boy!\/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/Hey, @! You made it!$h\/faceDirection Alex 1/So... what do you think?\/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?#$b#Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... $9#$b#I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way.\/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/<dialogue who="George">You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h\/faceDirection Alex 1/Thanks, Grandpa.\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Kent">I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things.\/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/<dialogue who="Shane">Same\/pause 1200/<dialogue who="Gus">I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...$s\/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/<dialogue who="Shane">Hey!\/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message \"It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition.\"/pause 1000/message \"5,000g well spent!\"/pause 1000/Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!\" 3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: "distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/<dialogue who="Gus">Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion.\/pause 500/<dialogue who="Gus">...A rare visit from a very dear friend...\/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/<dialogue who="Gus">...My world-famous giant omelet!$h#$b#Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks.\/move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/<dialogue who="Gus">Willy? What do you think?\/pause 400/<dialogue who="Willy">Hmm...\/pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/<dialogue who="Willy">The mushrooms are a tad chewier than last year...\/pause 400/<dialogue who="Gus">Is that a good thing?$s\/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/<dialogue who="Willy">Aye, lad\/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house!$h\/faceDirection Gus 2/<dialogue who="Robin">These eggs are so rich and yellow... Marnie, are these from your place?\/faceDirection Gus 3/<dialogue who="Gus">Nope... You can thank @ over at %farm Farm!\/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/<dialogue who="Marnie">Mmmm... %farm eggs.\/pause 200/<dialogue who="Lewis">Mmph..\/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end"
